attributes.action: Bring vanishing spray foam to English football
attributes.additional_details:
Vanishing spray foam in the FIFA 2014 World Cup has been an outstanding success. It has been received with universal acclaim, from fans, players and of course, the sprayers themselves, referees.

We the undersigned say it is now time English football benefits from this innovation.

The Department for Culture, Media and Sport should call upon the FA to introduce the vanishing spray foam at all levels of English professional football,

For the sake of better fair play and that touch of added attraction for fans everywhere, bring the spray.

rejection.details: For the football authorities to consider.
